Kerrigan Abilities & Talents :: Heroes of the Storm (HotS)

Kerrigan

Title: Queen of Blades
Role: Melee Melee Assassin
Franchise: Starcraft
Price: 500 Gems | 4k gold

Statistics
Health1,764(+4.0%)
Regen3.68(+4.0%)
Mana490(+10)
Regen2.90(+0.098)
Atk Speed1.25 per second
Damage115(+4.0%)
Once a terran ghost with formidable psionic abilities, Sarah Kerrigan was betrayed by her allies and transformed into the Queen of Blades. Now freed of the dark one's corruption, Kerrigan faces a threat that could destroy the galaxy itself.
Builds & Guides Abilities & Talents Discussion

Explore Kerrigan’s abilities including: combat trait, base abilities, heroic abilities, and abilities gained through talents. You can also find Kerrigan’s talent tree at the bottom of the page.

Combat Trait
Assimilation
Gain 10% of damage dealt from Basic Attacks and Abilities as Shields for 6 seconds. Shield amount gained doubled against Heroes.
Abilities
(Q) Ravage
Leap to a target, dealing 130 (+4% per level) damage. If the enemy dies within 1.5 seconds, restore 1 charge and refund 20 Mana.
(W) Impaling Blades
Pulls enemies within the target area towards Kerrigan, dealing 25 damage. After 2.5 seconds, an explosion occurs around Kerrigan, dealing 165 damage to nearby enemies.
(E) Primal Grasp
Pulls enemies within the target area towards Kerrigan, dealing 195 (+4% per level) damage.
Heroic Abilities(Granted at level 10)
(R) Maelstrom
Deals 74 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.
(R) Summon Ultralisk
After 0.5 seconds, summon an Ultralisk rushes forward upon spawning, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.

The Ultralisk's Basic Attacks deal 50% of their damage in an area around their target. Reactivate to retarget the Ultralisk.
Abilities Gained Through Talents
